name: The Jurist, Prudence
description:
The Jurist, Prudence is a prototype of a game we hope to commercially release soon.

You play the part of Prudence and Jurist tasked with hearing and deciding on legal cases brought before you in a fantastical setting. Based on the laws and facts presented to them it is solely up to the player to decide how to rule, and to see that justice is done. 

This prototype is a single case for people to explore and accounts for roughly 20min of gameplay.

This game is being developed by kellymac,  @damousey, 89zeroand @nickhallsa for RenderHeads South Africa
